name: Star Hole
description:
You are a black hole that wants to clean up the mess in space. 

The stars fell out of the constellation. Help them get back to their place. 

Don't let enemy black holes drag them in!

Use your computer mouse to move.

Code:

Kamil Brzeziński

Michał Brzeziński

Maria "Ayveris" Musińska
